message.body: Hey Danny. I know we talked with your parents about my wedding but I wanted to make sure word got to you and see if their response was speaking for you as well.
Oh im not sure what they said to you but im not going to be able to make it. Thats a bit too far for me these days unfortunately. Congratulations though! Im sure itll be a wonderful time
Thanks man. I hope life's treating you well these days.
Yeah ill hafta get down south at some point
We have a guest room waiting.
And an open invite any time.
Sweet in going to have to take you up on that
Please do. I miss my cousins lol. There's a nice area to go out down by the waterfront and we live right by the beach.
That sounds awesome. You in north or south Carolina
North. Myrtle Beach is about an hour and a half South of us.
